briefTitle: Study to Compare Zoladex™ 10.8 mg With Zoladex 3.6 mg in Pre-menopausal Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: An Open Label, Randomised, Parallel Group, Multicentre Study to Compare ZOLADEX™ 10.8 mg Given Every 12 Weeks With ZOLADEX 3.6 mg Given Every 4 Weeks in Pre-menopausal Women With Oestrogen Receptor Positive Advanced Breast Cancer.
summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the efficacy and safety as well as the characteristics of the female hormone and study medications after administration in pre-menopausal women with estrogen receptor positive advanced breast cancer who were randomised in a 1:1 ratio to either of the two treatment groups; the ZD9393 3.6 mg depot group or ZD9393 10.8 mg depot group, both given in combination with tamoxifen tablets.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Progression-free Survival (PFS) at 24 Weeks
